item.description:
This Thursday is supposed to be pretty cold following Sandey, so we'd love to have our friends come over!

A couple of things you should know in advance:

- We have 3 cats. People with mild allergies have been able to hang out with no problem, but if you are very allergic, leave a comment and we'll find an alternate place.

- There is no parking on my side of the street starting about 50' from my door (we're on a one-way st). It is usually pretty easy to find parking during the day.

- You can always just take the T, we are pretty close to Ashmont on the Red line.
item.name: Korean playgroup - SoBo
